extendedInfo.description: Mobile Office is your Phone.com mobile extension. Phone.com account required (FREE 30-day trial).Place calls, manage, listen and read your voicemail, hold conference calls, view faxes, block unwanted callers and send SMS text using your Phone.com number.Please contact us for help: support@phone.com

reviews.title: Works ok
reviews.comment: I can generally listen to voice mail. However if I go to delete old messages from the inbox, they will delete from the list, but if I refresh or get out of the app and come back in they are back. They never actually get deleted. The app is good for using the conferencing features and such. Just not as good as their actual service.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 10 years behind.
reviews.comment: -Coming from Line2 I am feeling the pain, very basic text messaging. Be able to dial from phone contacts is missing (not from a link or web page), deleting voice or text messages before hiting refresh will put all deleted back to place and inbox never goes back to empty. It doesn\'t associate received text with phone contact name.
reviews.author: Ray Paz

reviews.title: CANNOT FAX OUT ON MOBILE
reviews.comment: I used this service from my laptop to send out faxes for years. I\'d give the company a 5 star rating for service, etc.  BUT on the mobile app, while you can VIEW a fax, you can no longer send a fax!   You can\'t even go to the website directly because it\'ll throw you into the mobile login page. The mobile site lacks the fax functionality that you can still get on your laptop! I\'d use my laptop except I\'m no longer at my laptop!   I\'m thinking of canceling my account now.
reviews.author: Deborah Kim

reviews.title: Call logs and messages not working
reviews.comment: The call logs do not show any messages past April 26 and messages always show as new whether you check them or delete them, they keep coming back
reviews.author: Maceo D

reviews.title: Worthless without call log
reviews.comment: The call log bug is back. The only reason I downloaded this app was for the call log and number blocking feature. When the call log doesn\'t update, this app is worthless to me.
reviews.author: Johnny Briggs

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for what I need.  My fiance is in prison and I needed a local number to save on calls.  I know that wasn\'t the intention of this app but you may have stumbled upon something.  There are literally hundreds of thousands of people.like me who would love to pay a small monthly fee to be able to use a local number on our existing phone without having to change our main number.  You should look into creating a prison calls app.  I would do it myself but don\'t.known how. Thank you!!
reviews.author: Ashley Misek

reviews.title: Unable to login/authorize
reviews.comment: Bought service but can\'t use on my galaxy nexus. authorization call comes through and says success but so never logs in and tries to repeat the process..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confused.
reviews.comment: I just signed up for a number. Didn\'t get told where to find the PIN to log in on my mobile. And when I called my new number from another phone to test it, someone else answered (and annoyingly too..)  So embarrassed... and there\'s nothing in the FAQ about it. Might uninstall... it\'d be nice to know whether I really have a number or am sharing it with someone else..
reviews.author: Lehua Kauhane

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: I own a newspaper. Its great for me and my employees! They love calling on the go! If they are on a story, they can call someone directly from their office extension on their cell phone. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Never a problem. Web site menus a little confusing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs Improvement
reviews.comment: This app has not grown with my biz needs. They can learn a lot from their competing app by RingCentral in regards to user experience.  Lots of taps required do basic things and no ability to switch between functions (like searching the phone book) except backing all the way out to home screen of app. Then when returning to do a phonebook search your previous efforts are not preserved. App has functionality- but needs some UX attention.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It want let me open ot keep saying force close
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on modern phones
reviews.comment: Force close on my htc one x. Uninstalling and getting a refund.
reviews.author: Ryan Tennyson

reviews.comment: I have the Virtual Office account, so this works. But it utterly muds up my phone\'s native settings, including the call log. Cant change in-app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t think it through
reviews.comment: Yes, I can make calls, but only if it rings back on my cell and uses my minutes (won\'t use WiFi).  No incoming calls and the Call Log doesn\'t work, so you aren\'t even told you got a call.  Text messaging works via WiFi (so no extra charges there), but it doesn\'t check for messages any more often than 30 minutes, so don\'t expect a quick conversation. Also, the New Message count just keeps going up until you mark all the messages as Old using a web browser.  2 stars because it works and doesn\'t crash.
reviews.author: Jeff Lindstrom

reviews.comment: It was a great up before upgrading:-(now I can log in .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Because I have android 1.5 you dont care to make this app for me. Force close.. motorola i1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app with great features. Just can\'t til which number the incoming calls are coming from. I can\'t deactivate as well, calls are still coming in!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app would be fantastic if I could set to ask what number to call outbound on for each call.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well, looking forward to more features
reviews.author: A Google User
